00026 // lbann_distributed_minibatch_parallel_io .hpp .cpp - parallel I/O routines for distriubted minibatches
00028 
00029 #ifndef LBANN_DISTRIBUTED_MINIBATCH_PARALLEL_IO_HPP_INCLUDED
00030 #define LBANN_DISTRIBUTED_MINIBATCH_PARALLEL_IO_HPP_INCLUDED
00031 
00032 #include "lbann/lbann_base.hpp"
00033 #include "lbann/lbann_comm.hpp"
00034 #include "lbann/data_readers/lbann_data_reader.hpp"
00035 
00036 namespace lbann
00037 {
00038   class distributed_minibatch_parallel_io {
00039   public:
00040     distributed_minibatch_parallel_io(lbann_comm* comm, int num_parallel_readers, uint mini_batch_size, std::map<execution_mode, DataReader*> data_readers);
00041 
00042     int fetch_to_local_matrix(Mat& M_local);
00043     void distribute_from_local_matrix(Mat& M_local, CircMat& Ms);
00044     bool is_data_set_processed();
00045     int get_num_parallel_readers();
00046 
00047     virtual int fetch_from_data_reader(Mat& M_local) { return 0; }
00048     virtual void preprocess_data_samples(Mat& M_local, int num_samples_in_batch) {}
00049     virtual bool update_data_reader() { return false; }
00050     virtual execution_mode get_execution_mode() { return execution_mode::invalid; }
00051 
00053     bool is_current_root() { return (comm->get_rank_in_model() == m_root); }
00054 
00055   public:
00056     lbann_comm* comm;
00057     int m_root; 
00058     int m_num_parallel_readers_training; 
00059     int m_num_parallel_readers_validating; 
00060     int m_num_parallel_readers_testing; 
00061     int m_local_reader_done;
00062     uint m_mini_batch_size; 
00063     bool m_local_data_valid; 
00065     long m_num_data_per_epoch;
00066   };
00067 }
00068 
00069 #endif  // LBANN_DISTRIBUTED_MINIBATCH_PARALLEL_IO_HPP_INCLUDED
